MAGNET.description: Pulls items within an 8 block radius towards you

PLAGUE.description: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs

HAWKEYE.description: Condense Arrow Storm into a tight beam. Arrows deal ✤10%, ✦1%, and ❋1%

GREED.description: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 15% max health

CAVALRYMAN.description: You may cast spells and attack with a 70% damage penalty while on a horse

GUARDIAN.description: 20% of the damage taken by nearby allies is redirected to you

HERO.description: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 30% bonus damage and defense

ALTRUISM.description: Nearby players gain 35% of the health you naturally regenerate

ARCANES.description: 30% chance for spells to cost no mana when casted

ROVINGASSASSIN.description: Vanish no longer drains mana while invisible

MADNESS.description: Cast a random ability every 3 seconds

LIGHTWEIGHT.description: You no longer take fall damage

SORCERY.description: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost

TAUNT.description: Mobs within 12 blocks target you upon casting War Scream

RALLY.description: Charge heals you by 10% and nearby allies by 15% on impact, but becomes harmless

CHERRY_BOMBS.description: Your Smoke Bombs explode instantly, and increase their Neutral Damage by +90%

FREERUNNER.description: Double your sprint speed when your sprint bar is under 30%

PEACEFUL_EFFIGY.description: Your totem will last twice as long

FURIOUS_EFFIGY.description: Totem effects are twice as fast, but duration is halved

FLASHFREEZE.description: Ice Snake is instant but has a reduced range

GRAVITYWELL.description: Meteor has increased blast radius and pulls enemies instead

DESC_SNOWYSTEPS.description: Leaves a trail of snow behind you

GEOCENTRISM.description: Aura radiates from you instead of your totem and can be cast anytime
